resources.string: Allow app to read your Google account password.

"This will add a Google account to this device.
Note that applications may read your account's email address without notifying you!"

"By signing in, you are agreeing to the Google Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Google Play Terms of Service.
Plase note that this is not the official Google application. If you're not sure what this means, stop signing in!"
Your device is contacting Google… This should be done in a few seconds.
The account with email address $m has been added to your device.
Always allow access for this app
